Detailed Description

Simple class used to encode & decode JSON with PHP.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

__construct ( )

class constructor

Member Function Documentation

jsonDecode (   $json,
  $assoc = true,
  $depth = 512,
  $options = 0 
)

Decoding method. Replaces the native function to be a bit more robust

Parameters
string $json the string of JSON to be decoded
bool $assoc whether or not to return an associative array (FALSE means return an object)
int $depth how many recursions
mixed $options options to pass to the native json_decode
Returns
bool
jsonEncode (   $json,
  $options = 0,
  $depth = 512 
)

Decode method. Basically just a tad more robust handling of the to-be-encoded data

Parameters
mixed $json the stuff to encode. Typically an array
mixed $options options to pass to the native function
int $depth how far to recurse
string| bool
Returns
string
